special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: The diviner is a 15th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). The diviner has the following wizard spells prepared:

descriptions.raw: Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, message, true strike
descriptions.hyperlinked: Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, message, true strike

descriptions.raw: 1st level (4 slots): detect magic*, feather fall, mage armor
descriptions.hyperlinked: 1st level (4 slots): detect magic*, feather fall, mage armor

descriptions.raw: 2nd level (3 slots): detect thoughts*, locate object*, scorching ray
descriptions.hyperlinked: 2nd level (3 slots): detect thoughts*, locate object*, scorching ray
3rd level (3 slots): clairvoyance*, fly, fireball

descriptions.raw: 4th level (3 slots): arcane eye*, ice storm, stoneskin
descriptions.hyperlinked: 4th level (3 slots): arcane eye*, ice storm, stoneskin

descriptions.raw: 5th level (2 slots): Rary's telepathic bond*, seeming*
descriptions.hyperlinked: 5th level (2 slots): Rary's telepathic bond*, seeming*

descriptions.raw: 6th level (1 slot): mass suggestion, true seeing*
descriptions.hyperlinked: 6th level (1 slot): mass suggestion, true seeing*

descriptions.raw: 7th level (1 slot): delayed blast fireball, teleport
descriptions.hyperlinked: 7th level (1 slot): delayed blast fireball, teleport

descriptions: * Divination spell of 1st level or higher

special_abilities.name: Portent (Recharges after the Diviner Casts a Divination Spell of 1st Level or Higher).
descriptions: When the diviner or a creature it can see makes an attack roll, a saving throw, or an ability check, the diviner can roll a d20 and choose to use this roll in place of the attack roll, saving throw, or ability check.

actions.name: Quarterstaff.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d6-1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8-1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.
